Constructor Detail

NaturalTranslator

public NaturalTranslator(Formula f)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
The constructor performs basic checks to verify that the translation is syntactically possible (Existential, universal operators, sentence and one variable). Moreover it remove the abbreviations used in the formula (Always,Sometime). In this sense the constructor "modifies" the original formula.

Parameters:
f -
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
Method Detail

getOriginalFormula

public Formula getOriginalFormula()
Returns the original formula after applying some preprocessing. The formula is equivalent to the original one, but not necessarily the same.

Returns:

removeAbbr

private void removeAbbr()
Remove the abbreviations like Sometime and Always from the formula.

public Formula getTranslation()
The main method of the class that returns the translation over natural of the original formula.

private Formula getModalEquivalences()

tr

private Formula tr(Formula f,
                   boolean past)
Corresponds to the \xi operator. The parameter "past" express whether we are talking about \xi + or - .
